website_summaries.verdict: With a 100% money-back guarantee, you can return this multivitamin if it doesn't work for you.
pros: Including an immunity-boosting blend of Goldenseal Root, Echinacea, Spirulina and Garlic sets it apart from other multivitamins
The brand is made in the USA and tested for quality, so  you can trust their manufacturing
cons: The pills can be large to swallow comfortably for some people

customer_reviews.title: Only multivitamin I will buy
customer_reviews.text: My only go to multivitamin, plus I use 4 other of this brands vitamins for the rest of ny family. I was deficient in everything known to man kind...to the point were my doctor was very concerned. I'm a healthy eater, but that was not doing the job. I tried cheaper vitamins, had blood work taken and my numbers barely moved. Started taking these twice a day, and after a month all my numbers were above what the doctor was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins have almost everything I could ask for in a multivitamin. Love that there's B12 and folic acid and a ton of biotin. They have helped my hair and nails grow faster and healthier. I can feel the difference between days that I take them and days that I don't. Perhaps that is placebo, but it works nonetheless! I recommend these for sure. Definitely follow the instructions and take in the morning with food. If you take them at night, you'll wake up with stinky B vitamin pee and none of the nutrients will get absorbed by your system.
customer_reviews.author: cari blaker

customer_reviews.title: ... Daily Multivitamin for a year now and have experienced better overall health
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Women’s Daily Multivitamin for a year now and have experienced better overall health; more energy, clarity, focus and my blood tests confirm these improvements, especially in Vit D and B12 levels which are sometimes challenging to meet. As a senior am grateful to have discovered this superior daily multivitamin!
customer_reviews.author: George Sand

customer_reviews.title: Dream Product for PCOS
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS. It’s annoying because it makes me insulin resistant and hyper-sensitive to certain vitamins. After going around in circles for years with supplements that made me sick a/o bloated, I tried these... and that was that. I’ve been taking them for several months now, and they make me feel energized without any side effects. Also, given my required plant-based diet, knowing these come from greens and fruits make me feel even better. I’m a massive fan, and I’ll take ‘em until they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vitamin.  Gave me energy
customer_reviews.text: The only other time I have been truly impressed but a multivitamin was when I was taking very expensive melaleuca brand vitamins. To me, these companre to those. I actually felt a difference when I didn't take one. I hope to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Ervasti

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Energy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these on and off for the past 2 years. They give me energy and I don’t get sluggish during the day. Tried another brand of women’s vitamins for a bit but went back to Vimerson and noticed such a big difference. I feel good and active when taking the Vimerson.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G

customer_reviews.title: If you have Anxiety, DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me this supplement is dangerously high in stimulants! (high dose B6, B12, and Folic Acid) I finally put two and two together and realized my daily anxiety attacks where being triggered by this, even worse if combined with caffeine. PMS irritability increased as well as aggression and anger at other times when I’m usually calm. I don’t recognize myself taking this! I was even taking a half dose since I’m petite.
customer_reviews.author: Kikibird4

customer_reviews.title: Vimerson Multivitamins for Women
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually a big believer in multivitamins, but due to health concerns, I was taking a copious amount of individual vitamins and minerals. I started using other Vimerson products because they're "clean". I decided to try their Women's Multivitamin, just to see if they made a difference in how I feel. I have more energy and stamina now! And there are no hormones, sugar, or yeast, which no one needs in their vitamin tablets. I plan to continue to buy my supplements from Vimerson!
customer_reviews.author: SabineR21

customer_reviews.title: I had a very bad allergic reaction yesterday
customer_reviews.text: I had a very bad allergic reaction yesterday. I took it with organic almond milk and Vitamin D, Selenium and Quercetin. This was the only new product. My lymph nodes were swollen, I couldn't swallow, rushes and redness everywhere. The only reason we didn't call the 911 because I had a strong antihistamine med with me and it worked. (I'm allergic to bee and ant bites.) I had to skip a work day because of it. I took many various kind of multi vitamins in my life but this never happened. Something is definitely not right with this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K.

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: These are great vitamins been taking them for 2 years now. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: latoria hunter

customer_reviews.title: There are so many new products being released everyday that I feel like I don't have to buy the same two things ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a repurchase. It's safe to say that I rarely ever repurchase anything. There are so many new products being released everyday that I feel like I don't have to buy the same two things ever. But If I really like a product and it works for me, it makes the rotation. With that being said, I have purchased this vitamin several times and I really like it. It does not have a nasty aftertaste like many others do and the pills are not hard to swallow. Also, I like that it has all the essentials that a woman needs so I do not have to cocktail it with a whole bunch of other pills.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: Within 30 minutes of first dose face became hot, swollen, throbbing. Reaction progressed to vomiting and hives. Very dangerous, and because I have NO food allergies at all I think there is a dangerous combination of herbs or something very rare in this pill that isn’t declared on the label. I’m lucky I threw up enough of it and held down some Benadryl or I would have ended up in the ER!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Rash
customer_reviews.text: Finally figured out that this was causing an allergic reaction. Oddly, not every time I took it but twice now. Id love a refund on it, but the window has closed. Be cautious with it. Read the reviews. Crazy red rash that started on my face and traveled to my neck, chest and arms. I felt like I was on fire
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great ingredients. Not hard on my stomach at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great ingredients. Not hard on my stomach at all and have been taking them for a few days now and surprisingly i haven't needed coffee these past few days to get me going also they got my tummy working after trying tea and prune juice . Happy buyer
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Not so “Natural”.
customer_reviews.text: Contains a lot of synthetic properties. If your looking for something more natural, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Geanette Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins as they include everything that I need, all in one daily dose.
customer_reviews.author: Christy R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally felt the difference on the first day of taking these vitamins! I have way more energy and an overall feeling of wellness! I'll never go back to store bought vitamins. I also ordered them and received them on the same day!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Horen

customer_reviews.title: ... trying to figure out which ones work and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Vitamins are a pain when trying to figure out which ones work and a waste of money.. These I can tell you WORK and are worth the money.. I love them.. from the moment I took the first two, I felt the difference. Thank you for a great product :)

customer_reviews.text: This product gave me horrible heart burn and excessive flatulence that lasted all day! Thought maybe by taking just one capsule instead of 2 would help but it didn't! I stopped taking it all together and am feeling better! I did however, like it at first, but the longer I took it the more pronounce my symptoms became. I guess this product just doesn't agree with me!

customer_reviews.text: Red, hot, hour long rash developed three times. No longer taking. Rash appeared to be niacin flush- face, chest, arms, hands. Something very off
customer_reviews.author: caren a.

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY TO DISCOVER THIS VITAMIN!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman in my 70’s and have never been able to find a vitamin that agreed with my sensitive gut..... Until now! This Vimerson multi for women is worthy of a million stars. Not only are there no adverse effects, I actually feel more energy and am healthier. I have recommended this vitamin to my friends who are asking me why I am brighter and not caving in at 6pm as before. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie shelofsky

customer_reviews.title: ... but for some reason they made me break out terribly. I had to send them back unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I am sure these are a decent vitamin but for some reason they made me break out terribly. I had to send them back unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Do the Trick
customer_reviews.text: My holistic doctor told me that I should get a multivitamin because my chronic illness makes me loose hair and nutrients. It's only been 2 days taking this so I don't know if it's helping my hair yet but my sensitive stomach has no problem with these. It seems to be a great product. I am excited to see how it affects my energy and hair loss problem. Update: losing way less hair and I think it is helping me have more energy. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible and expensive for me. The vitamins are larger than what I am used to. It has a bad aftertaste that last for hours after even want taken out the meal. I feel sick for a whole day after taking this vitamin and wouldn't recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: So, I really wanted to like these vitamins and give them a higher rating but I just couldn’t. Use: 1 week, 7 days straight Pros: saw significant results on hair growth, nail growth, skin wasn’t as dry Cons: these broke my face out really bad in big painful cystic acne that I rarely get unless my hormones are involved, made my pee super green/yellow ALL day even after drinking 8-12 glasses of water
customer_reviews.author: Neha Ali

customer_reviews.title: These pills are not good for me
customer_reviews.text: I get hungry AF with this pills and as a result I've been eating a lot! Got 4 pounds in 2 weeks and now I have a big belly and I am a model I'm supposed to have flat abs, the pills description says it helps with weight management, such a lie. Also, it makes me drowsy, nauseous, I get a headache... I'm supposed to take two pills in the morning with breakfast but I work in the mornings and this effects are not helping. It makes my pee greenish/yellow, it upsets my stomach... I think maybe the product is fine but not what my body needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Minyeo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy about this purchase. After reading reviews, I figured I would give them a try, as there aren’t many vitamins that have decent reviews. I wish I would have never purchased these, bc they are terrible. About 20-30 mins after taking these (with or without food) I got nauseous, and vomited. They gave me a terrible stomach ache that I ignored for the first 3 days, but wasn’t able to handle it anymore. The taste lingers in your throat and mouth for hours, and each burp tasted like garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie D.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for me I guess
customer_reviews.text: I liked these the first month I took them, but after a couple weeks I only took one a day because they seemed like I was getting too much of something. Now, I get sick and very weak when I take any so I quit. There is something in them I'm getting too much of and my body doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me nauseous
customer_reviews.text: I never had a sensitivity to anything. I can eat everything I put in my mouth. I’ve experienced strange nausea every time I take it. Really, after each time I took two capsules I feel like I have to vomit. It’s not the size of the capsule, it’s some ingredient in it. Will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: MasonK84

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT VALUE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this supplement. I needed something holistic and reliable for maintaining my vitamin levels after bariatric surgery (Gastric Bypass/Roux En Y} and this supplement offers the levels of B1 (Thiamin) plus enzymes for maintaining digestive health. This is a HUGE bonus as I've developed IBS since surgery.. I have to take two a day due to absorption issues that the surgery relies on for weight loss, so the quantity is perfect for me. My doctor says my vitamin levels are perfect, especially my calcium and iron. Thank you so much for offering this product at an affordable price! Kudos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna C

customer_reviews.title: Caused Mouth Sores?
customer_reviews.text: I am having terrible trouble with mouth sore that usually I can control with Niciacin. After going back and reading the 2 star reviewers, I found the one that comments on an outbreak of mouth sores. I would never have considered these multivitamins as a possible cause. Since I have taken all except the last 1 or 2 days worth, I would not consider returning them. What could possibly be in these pills that upset so many people? The Amazon multiples do a very good job for me. So wlll stick with them.
customer_reviews.author: raven blacke

customer_reviews.title: Pounding headache!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this multivitamin as I really like Vimerson’s joint supplement (with Turmeric & MSM). This multivitamin however, gives me a pounding headache. It’s almost 4am as I write this. The headache has kept me up all night I want to cry! I also noticed earlier today my eyes were swollen all day. I didn’t connect till now that I may be allergic to something in these pills. It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Iheartdogsnyc

customer_reviews.title: ... and cause me to cancel work due to a terrible reaction.
customer_reviews.text: This has niacin in it which can cause the niacin flush it has too much and cause me to cancel work due to a terrible reaction.
customer_reviews.author: rtm

customer_reviews.title: Different pills in 2nd bottle ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I received was great. I can only tolerate 1 pill with a meal otherwise I feel nauseated. Not a big deal. I feel good, food energy. I ordered a second bottle and the pills look different. I’m not a fan of that inconsistency. Not sure why they are different.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Q

customer_reviews.title: ... when I received these vitamins the label looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Weirded out because when I received these vitamins the label looks nothing like the picture. Seems sketchy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for the premenopausal!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive system especially since now I am 46 and experiencing premenopausal symptoms. I only take one a day and it has changed my life. I no longer have that “ on the edge feeling “ or panicky feelings I used to have. It literally used to drive me crazy. I always felt like I was super alert and hyper which caused extreme nervousness. I was sensitive to sound and noise and sometimes it was hard to get a good nights sleep. After I started taking this I noticed I felt so much better. I had no side effects or headaches. These vitamins are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Nakeeta Malone

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Severe Nausea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these vitamins but they make me severely nauseous. The recommended dose was 2 pills but that made me incredibly sick. I decreased my dosage to just one pill and that still makes me feel sick. My body really does not agree with these vitamins. Also they have a very unpleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: Krista H.

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my PMS
customer_reviews.text: So after 3 months of use, my PMS symptoms well most of them were gone! I use to get very tender breast and under arm swelling (lymph area) this month I had NONE OF IT. Cramps have been significantly reduced as well! Also don’t quote me yet but it seems to have lessened my days🤭. When I was younger my period would last 3 days. As I got older they went to 5-7 days. But this month it’s looking like 3 😃! It has helped with hair growth as well😀. Haven’t seen any changes in my skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Byebye painful stomach aches
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have PCOS and that causes a lot of digestion issues. Ive changed to dairy free, gluten free and low sugar and it helps but not fully so anyway I got these vitamins because i read it helps a lot of the PCOS symptoms not really realizing it could help my stomach aches but anyway im on my 3rd month of these and NO painful STOMACH aches anymore. I will continue to buy them just for this! Its so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: N cple

customer_reviews.title: small opinion so far?
customer_reviews.text: i have only been taking them for about a week now ... i don't see a real difference ... but i will keep ya posted. wanted a new daily vitamin and it works ... no worries ... i have had the chewable lately ... and they are okay ...but sometimes i wonder if i should be taking something for the ladies ... like i am 40 years of age ..but they tend to make things for 50 and older ... or younger ... what about us in between ages?? what are we 2 do?? HELLO!! any one ... u listening. we need stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: ElizrdbthSpeaks

customer_reviews.title: Makes me nauseous/vomit
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to take this a couple times and it makes me nauseous. One time, I vomited about 20 minutes after taking it. I've taken it with food and without. I wish I could return it, but my return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Kim

customer_reviews.title: It actually freaking works!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. I have noticed tremendous changes in my mental and physical health since I began taking this multivitamin. I understand that the directions state to take 2 per day, but I decided to only take 1 to see how my body would react. Personally, I plan to stay at this rate as I have felt much better and feel no need to consume more than that. I do highly recommend this product, however, everyone is different and may not gain as much as I have. If you are feeling sluggish, fatigue, near in depression, moodiness, confused even, then I highly recommend trying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these vitamins for about a month and a half now. I love them. I have not noticed any adverse reactions, i have noticed a large increase in my energy and mental focus. I love that i can trust that what i am taking is actually doing what it claims to be doing unlike some of the drugstore brands. My metabolism has been better also which is always a good thing. I will definitely keep taking these!
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a simpler multivitsmin supplement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these vitamins not realizing that the via min D levels were lower than I required. I was also overwhelmed by all the ingredients for things that I am not interested such as something to boost my energy, or help with hormones. The directions on bottle say fir those sensitive person take only one a day. I would not know if I am sensitive. I don't wish to find out through trial & error if I am or not. I was hoping for a simpler supplement for vegans including 2000 iu of vitamin D3.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin I have ever taken
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this! This is the best vitamin I have ever taken. I do a lot of research on vitamins and supplements. I have been on medication for years with fibromyalgia, polymyalgia and to many to list. I am almost off all my medication now. Since I have been taking this vitamin I noticed more energy and overall wellness of health. Amazing ingredients. Amazing product! I will continue to purchase this! They also have a men's vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Leon

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and my recent order looks different. The left is what it looked like, the right is what it is now. I will no longer purchase vitamins from this company.
customer_reviews.author: A. Somo

customer_reviews.title: Was great and now they aren’t
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle of these and I have really liked them. This last bottle has a horrific smell. I can’t even eat them! I checked the date and they aren’t expired or anything. They are nothing like the previous bottles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tinger

customer_reviews.title: The smell and taste really bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so let me just say that I almost throw up the first time I tried taking these pills!!! They smell like uncooked fish or something really gross! The taste is similar in that it is not a pleasant experience when these r in your mouth. I have to put the smell way back in my tongue n chug a lot of water to even swallow these without gagging! Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: It contains fake vitamin e which I am highly sensitive to. I had chest pains for days . I do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have 2 bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product is very gentle on the stomach, no weird side effects i.e bloating, gas ,feeling fatigued. I don't feel increase in energy, but my skin is starting to look polished. downside it that these are capsule vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hinkle-Allen

customer_reviews.title: Off smell
customer_reviews.text: These smell and taste so weird, almost fishy but there’s no fish oils in it so I don’t know where it comes from, I don’t see a huge difference with these over my last ones I used to buy so I don’t think I’ll get these again. But they were nicely packaged and work for an everyday vitamin. Just can’t swallow sometimes from the smell/taste.

customer_reviews.title: Intense stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: Very bad stomach pain!!!! Took 3 days of not taking for my stomach to stop hurting
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Young

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these about a month ago I wanted a multivitamin that would give me energy and this is doing the job. I feel better overall I only take one a day though I felt like two were too many, along with this vitamin I take a probiotic and prebiotic as well. Overall everything seems to be moving along great and I'll repurchase in the future. These vitamins are easy to swallow and I can digest easily it doesn't cause any stomach problems and I usually take with breakfast and a tall glass of water.

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have to be seafood fish, shell fish, and gluten free. Thought I would make it work but still got a slight reaction. Still looking for a 100% gluten free, seafood and fish free multi vitamin
customer_reviews.author: Gaby A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like poison
customer_reviews.text: I opened my bottle today and was hit with the very strong scent of bitter almond...aka the scent of cyanide. I’m definitely not going to try taking these, but I’m curious: has anyone else noticed this scent and lived to tell the tale? I’d love to know if this is just an unfortunate feature of these pills and not someone trying to kill me. Either way, I’m staying far away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the results so far
customer_reviews.text: Doing wonders for my hair loss Since starting them the loss is down to practically none at all and I am generally feeling better. I would recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Great no side effects
customer_reviews.text: Daily support for my health. Enhances my energy and mood.

customer_reviews.title: Word of caution
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this product back in May. The back of the bottle says to take 2 BUT if you have stomach problems take 1. The pill on the left is a pill from the June/July batch. The pill on the right is a pill from this month October. The new pill is smaller and a different color. I am not sure how it is doing to my body and all the facts at the back say the same value. So just a word of caution, the pill has changed.
customer_reviews.author: amber hayes

customer_reviews.title: I love this amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I found this multivitamin,just how many days of taking this I already feel it’s working ...! So I give a 5 star for my honest review..I have more energy,and My blood pressure is not that high anymore , ..I bought this product because my high blood pressure is little bit high .. I’m happy with my purchased and I also read reviews before buying the product ..highly recommended !!!!

customer_reviews.title: WARNING — allergic reaction and vomiting
customer_reviews.text: 30 minutes after taking these vitamins I threw up and broke out in hives. Something is wrong with these vitamins. A lot of people have experienced similar issues! Amazon please do something about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Willa J.

customer_reviews.title: Weird change in capsule color and size
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this multi vitamins for several months. No complaints. But my latest renewal the capsule changed dramatically-not only in size but color as well. I’m not taking the new ones bc they don’t look right. For months mine have been a slightly larger yellowish capsule. Not it’s smaller and darkish tan. Not sure if it’s a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Hodge

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins have greatly improved my quality of life
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple chronic illnesses and have tried several different brands of multivitamins. My fiancé started taking the men’s variant from this brand and enjoyed them, so I decided to try the woman’s variant. I honestly feel like I have a lot more energy than I used to, and I don’t get as many random aches as I used to. They are extremely easy to swallow without there being any odd taste. I am very happy to have these as part of my daily health routine and will not go back to buying multivitamins from other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Sudden decrease in capsule size, after ordering this product for months
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this multivitamin for months and have never had a problem with it. I have never felt a significant difference whether I take it or not, but it has great reviews and high quality ingredients, so I take it to ensure I’m supplementing my diet appropriately. But I just ordered a new bottle and the capsules are significantly smaller than they have been. Not sure if this is a knock-off or just a bad batch but I will most likely be switching to a different brand, sadly. Very disappointed in this sudden change, and I paid the same price for it that I always have.
customer_reviews.author: eao891989

customer_reviews.title: Use Caution when consuming
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of these vitamins, they made my cyst in my breast expand in size.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Improved Energy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 1-stop vitamin that covered all women's health needs. This one covered everything with a mix of vitamins and supplements. I take it late morning and it gives me energy through my whole day. I am a big fan. Received a free bottle offer with my first purchase. The more you buy the more you save. I'm ordering the men's health for my husband. A must try.
customer_reviews.author: Uonle Liv1

customer_reviews.title: Vimerson Women's Multivitamins will help you all around.
customer_reviews.text: The Women's Multivitamin has helped me in more ways than I could have hoped. The vitamins and minerals in each dosage make me feel more alive. They have even helped reduce my bad headaches. I used to take a lot of supplements with my regular vitamin, but now I have cut back on these since they are already in the Vimerson vitamins. I have just ordered another 2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Constant Eye Twitching
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this multi vitamin was terrible. After taking it for only 2 weeks, I finally linked it to constant eye twitches and I don’t mean once in a blue moon. My eye was twitching every 15-20 minutes, obsessively. I noticed the eye twitching about 3 days after taking the multivitamin, but wasn’t able to link the two together until two weeks into taking the recommended dose. When I stopped taking it, it took about 2-3 weeks for my eyes to stop twitching and I haven’t changed or added anything to my diet and/or routine since. I was super disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing for Me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these did nothing for me. I took them as directed and noticed no change even after several weeks. They may help, but if they do it's with something that isnt visible or noticeable. Not for me!
customer_reviews.author: LadyO

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Vimerson Health..
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of Vimerson Women's Multivitamins. And I feel, and also notice the benefits. My blood pressure dropped to normal. My immune system response is on point. The overall energy level has also improved. No complaints. Thanks Vimerson Health..
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Swift

customer_reviews.title: Only vitamin I will buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins gave me no adverse side effects. Lota of energy and great for the ladies when they have that time of the month. Only vitamin I will buy!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin for sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues in the past with vitamins making me feel a bit off in the stomach. This vitamin is easy to swallow, with no distinguishable taste, and has not affected my stomach. The recommended dosage is 2 pills, but I have only been taking one because of my stomach issues in the past. I am going to up the dosage to see how I go, but I feel that it will be fine. I like that these vitamins are powder in a capsule for quick absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me 😞
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately every time I take these (and I only take one) I've tried with food I've tried without. I've tried before eating I've tried after . These always make me nauseous and sometimes actually sick.. I'm not really sure the reason. My husband takes the men's one and is fine 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH GOAD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have taken packets of vitamins & supplements for the past 20 years: large, hard to swallow pills. I switched over to Women's Daily Multivitamin about six months ago. I am very happy that I did. A moments time taking one easy to swallow pill. It has no aftertaste & works as well as the combination of pills that I previously used.
customer_reviews.author: robb quick

customer_reviews.title: I love these..
customer_reviews.text: Grew my hair and nails also.. And helps keep you healthy from colds.. Wuth the Echinacea ..goldenseal and garlic.. Omg best ingredients.. I will always take these vitamins..
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Many B vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My pee was neon green because I was taking the recommended amount of two pills a day. That was easily solved by going down to one pill a day. Just a heads up. (:
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Weight gain!!
customer_reviews.text: This product induces hunger! it took me a while after 2 bottles and 20 pounds heavier to figure out that it was actually it that made me insatiable. Horrible horrible product, I wish I could sue
customer_reviews.author: Maks

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the Women's Daily MultiVitamin Multimineral Supplement for 30-days now and I have noticed a difference in my fingernails, believe it or not. My nails have always been very thin and brittle, snapping off constantly. Now, I'm actually able to grow my nails out and their looking nice and strong. YAY!! The vitamins are relatively easy to swallow and there is no after taste and no smell. Will definitely continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin for Women
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin was recommended, and I love it. I was looking for a good women's vitamin and this became it. My skin is clear, hair and nails are strong and I like how it makes me feel. I definitely spread the word to get this vitamin and now my mom is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: More Energy
customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking Vimerson Women's Mulitvitamin Supplement for about a month and a half, and have noticed a little more energy. I plan to continue to take these multivitamins much longer with the hope that I will continue to get even much more energy as my body adjusts to them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients carefully!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews, I decided to buy it because majority are positive reviews so I didn’t bother to read the ingredients. But this product isn’t for everyone because I noticed there’s a pattern after using this product. I’ve experienced bad headaches, some rash and horrible heart burn (which I didn’t have before).
customer_reviews.author: jle002

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied, and perhaps in time I'll want to try ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm finding that the multivitamin is giving me a sense that I have more energy and a focus. I've certainly experienced more desire to get up earlier, get more done, and even exercise. My sensitivity to the ingredients is causing me to divide the dose to twice a day, rather than once, but that's not a problem, unless I forget. Overall, I'm satisfied, and perhaps in time I'll want to try other products down the road. For Now, I'll say that I think most would find this multivitamin to be a good choice for them.
customer_reviews.author: Alva N Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Caused Rash
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin gave me a rash on my arms, back, chest and sides. I’m assuming I have an allergy that I had no clue about (not allergic to anything else). Please pay attention to the ingredients before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Teaira

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins+Weight loss pills !!
customer_reviews.text: I got the vitamins to boost my immune system, energy and overall health. But in some mysterious way they’re also work as weight loss pills for me (NO,I’m not complaining), ever since I started taking them I don’t feel hungry, even after 5 pm (it’s usually when I want to eat my whole fridge) I can only eat a little and I feel so full!! This is awesome!!! I’ve already lost a few pounds.

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a week now and have has some minor reactions. I take 2 capsules with or after a meal. I do not have a history of allergies. After taking this product I start itching mainly under my chin and the sides of my face burn (lightly). I also feel a little foggy.. No increase in energy nor do I feel more alert. It's not a horrible product, but I've never experienced these types of side affects after taking vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these supplements for my mom.She was feeling extremely tired.Now she tells that best thing you have done for me.I am thankful to Vimerson Health for making it happen. It’s organic & excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mani

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product! I hate giving reviews on Amazon because sellers like to raise the price, and that’s when I stop buying. I changed my vitamin regime and I can definitely feel a difference in my body, especially my energy levels when taken with b12 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s all natural
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been off balance lately and I was looking for something to give me more energy while support by body and diet. I order this daily multivitamin and ever since I’ve been taking them I feel great haven’t had the need to drink coffee to get through the day at work and have more to get through the day on my days of cause I’m a mom of three and I need all the energy I can get so this is definitely a great product and I will be buying more also the best part is that it’s all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me sick
customer_reviews.text: My Husband uses the men version of this multi vitamin and loves it. I decided to give the women version a try. It makes my stomach hurts and gives me bad diarrhea. I put it away for a day and I was fine. Decided to give it another shot. I ended up missing work due to bad stomach cramps and diarrhea. Something in the ingredients is a bad combo. Really wish it worked out for me. 😓
customer_reviews.author: Dee Nzinga

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: I have an array of health issues ranging from a thyroid disease to a chronic pain condition. Since adding this vitamin to my daily routine I’ve noticed a massive positive change in my daily well being!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely HUGE to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about the effect since I can’t even take this supplier. The pill is extremely huge to swallow. Most huge pills I’ve ever seen. I even feel painful when I swallow the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive stomach = extreme cramping
customer_reviews.text: They make my stomach hurt! I have a sensitive stomach and literally makes my stomach feel like it’s turning and cramps really bad shortly after taking these. Says to take two but after the initial experience I mentioned I started only taking one to see if it made a difference and hell no. Do not take if you have a sensitive stomach lining... or take with A LOT of food!!
customer_reviews.author: KishaMarie93

customer_reviews.title: My go to vitamin.
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins. The company is great, I have ordered at least 5+ bottles of this so far! They always offer great coupon codes via email. I would definitely recommend checking out their website! Great company that makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They actually work great!
customer_reviews.text: They actually work for me! My nail and hair got so ugly after 2 years of breastfeeding... just with one bottle I notice some “baby hair” and my nails now strong and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: This vitamin pill  offers a good combination of vitamins for women.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a Vitamin supplement to my diet. to ensure I get all the vitamins I need in addition to my food intake. I am seeing a difference in my hair skin and nails. My skin is softer and my nails and hair are growing great. Extra energy still debatable but I feel better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Abbondandolo

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: As many on here I was shocked to see that my new order came in a semi different bottle and more importantly in a completely different capsule. Not sure why the company hasn't addressed this issue. Makes it hard to trust the product and company. Prior to this I have not had any negative side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Sullyht

customer_reviews.title: They seem to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: So my Doc said I needed some vitamins, but with some food allergies, I'm kinda limited. So after doing a good amount of research, i found these.... And I'm glad I did. I haven't had any issues with them and they don't make my pee neon. So bonus all around. There's no caffeine in them so I don't have to worry about the vitamin crash. Already on my 3rd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burning Rash on my Scalp and Hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vitamin twice. The first month was fine, but the second bottle I received was horrible. I took it daily for 1 week and started to develop a burning rash in my scalp and loss a handful of hair in 1 week. It wasn’t normal hair shedding. I gave my mom who was visiting a daily dose of this vitamin and she developed a rash. We didn’t think anything of it until the 7th day of taking this vitamin. I didn’t change my routine or add anything else to my daily vitamins. I’m not sure if I got a bad batch but please be careful if you purchase this product. Not happy that I had this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Lopez

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME AS BEFORE! DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this vitamin for 2 years now and it has NEVER smelled like SOUR, ROTTEN food. The entire container smelled horrendous and the taste was even more so. It was as if this batch had was faulty. I am extremely disappointed and will be looking for other vitamin brands. DO NOT BUY! Not the same as before!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer284

customer_reviews.title: Feel more energized
customer_reviews.text: I notice I feel better when i take these. Vitamins. Taste is as expected for vitamins. Gross but I'm not trying to taste them, just swallow them quick. I will continue to take these for my health.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don't take on an empty stomach
customer_reviews.text: These can upset the stomach if empty. Many vitamins/antioxidants have this affect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Women's Daily Multivitamin Multimineral Supplement. Vitamins and Minerals. Chromium, Magnesium, Biotin, Zinc, Calcium, Green Tea. Antioxidant Properties for Women. Heart, Breast Health. 60 Capsules
feature_bullets: WHY CHOOSE US: Unsatisfactory Health? Lack of motivation for your tasks daily? Vimerson Health may have you feeling healthier and more energized* with this perfectly combined daily multivitamin and mineral supplement; Our blend promotes heart health and blood circulation*, helps strengthen immune and digesitive systems*, supports breast and bone health* as well as promoting mental clarity and focus*

DESIGNED FOR WOMEN: This multivitamins health supplement is tailor made to meet the everyday nutritional needs of women;* It’s fortified with vitamins and minerals to boost energy, manage weight, strengthen the immune system, and slow down the aging process*

BETTER OVERALL HEALTH: Look and feel great with this multivitamin for women formula;* It may help facilitate better energy conversion from food while boosting energy levels, and strengthen bones while promoting breast health*

SAFE & GENTLE: Vimerson Health’s Women’s Multivitamin is formulated with the safest and most gentle ingredients; A friendly supplement with no hormones, or preservatives, also, is soy-free, sugar-free, GMO-free, gluten-free, and dairy-free

THE BEST INGREDIENTS MADE FOR YOU: Folic Acid Biotin Vitamin A (Beta Carotene) C D E B1 B2 (Riboflavin) B3 (Niacin) B5 B6 B12, Calcium, Magnesium, Zinc, Selenium, Copper Manganese, Chromium, Molybdenum, Wild Yam Extract, Red Clover Extract, Lutein, Cranberry Extract, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Lycopene, Goldenseal Root, Echinacea, Spirulina, Garlic, Green Tea, Hawthorne Berries, Cinnamon Bark Extract, Bilberry Fruit Extract, Grape Seed Extract, Black Currant Fruit Extract & Pomegranate Fruit Extract
